
《远程控制指令》

【远程控制接口】
get请求
http://182.92.242.32:5001/api/manaul?id=JFaa01&command=AA550006E00000910177

【采集设备远程控制指令】
读设备云ID[固定长度16位]
AA550006E00000910177
aa550010e000000a0091+[固定长度8字节16位,16进制]++[2字节CRC校验]

读设备版本
AA 55 00 04 E0 01 00 E5
AA 55 +[2字节PDU长度,从第5字节算起到最后]+ E0 01 + [16进制,ASCII码,需转成字符串] + [2字节CRC校验]

读设备网络信号强度
AA 55 00 04 E0 23 01 07
AA 55 +[2字节PDU长度,从第5字节算起到最后]+ E0 23 + [数据] + [2字节CRC校验]

设备复位
AA550004E00600EA

设置脚本执行周期
[300s]
AA55000800630000012C0098
[0s]
AA550008006300000000006B

设置上传数据包前缀
AA55000D004D0828181101638EEF5702EB

切换接口
AA550005E050000135

读脚本
AA550006E0000064014A
AA55+[2字节PDU长度,从第5字节算起到最后]+0064+[16进制,ASCII码,需转成字符串]+[2字节CRC校验]
如AA 55 01 78 00 64 40 44 49 31 3D 32 40 44 49 32 3D 32 40 44 49 33 3D 32 40 44 49 34 3D 32 40 49 46 3D 44 49 40 48 3D 44 44 30 31 40 43 3D 36 34 30 33 30 30 31 30 30 30 30 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 45 4C 53 45 40 48 3D 43 44 31 31 40 43 3D 30 42 30 34 30 30 30 30 30 30 33 34 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 31 32 40 43 3D 30 42 30 34 30 30 31 44 30 30 33 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 32 31 40 43 3D 30 43 30 34 30 30 30 30 30 30 33 34 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 32 32 40 43 3D 30 43 30 34 30 30 31 44 30 30 33 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 33 31 40 43 3D 30 44 30 34 30 30 30 30 30 30 33 34 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 33 32 40 43 3D 30 44 30 34 30 30 31 44 30 30 33 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 34 31 40 43 3D 30 45 30 34 30 30 30 30 30 30 33 34 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 43 44 34 32 40 43 3D 30 45 30 34 30 30 31 44 30 30 33 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 48 3D 44 44 30 31 40 43 3D 36 34 30 33 30 30 31 30 30 30 30 38 56 31 40 44 3D 33 53 40 53 3D 31 40 45 4E 44 49 46 0A 57 BF 
@DI1=2@DI2=2@DI3=2@DI4=2@IF=DI@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ELSE@H=CD11@C=0B0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ENDIF



[DO开关控制PDU]

DO1闭合
64060014000101FB
DO1断开
640600140000C03B
DO2闭合
640600150001503B
DO2断开
64060015000091FB
DO3闭合
640600160001A03B
DO3断开
64060016000061FB
DO4闭合
640600170001F1FB
DO4断开
640600170000303B



AA550006E0000064014A

【电表数据远程读取指令】
[总表]
600A表总电能获取
0B04001D0002E167
0b04040001324014d4

600A表三相电压电流获取
0B040000000670A2
0b040c09690969095e03d803c807081c8f
0b040c
0968
0966
095e
08e8
0b6809101ed4

0b040603e103e7039c12fc

0b040c
096a
0968
095f
0370
0c4802e06ea1

[线路1]
100A表总电能获取
0C04001D0002E0D0
0c0404000000782766

100A表三相电压电流获取
0C04000000067115
0c040c096c0969096000000000000037ee

[线路2]
160A表总电能获取
0D04001D0002E101
0d04040000005ab7bf

160A表三相电压电流获取
0D040000000670C4
0d040c096b096a095c0000000000000469

[线路3]
250A表总电能获取
0E04001D0002E132
0e040400012bb04a00

250A表三相电压电流获取
0E040000000670F7
0e040c0966096a0959006c000803a03887

TCP数据包前缀如AA01
AA550007004D02AA010101

设置有心跳
AA550005004901004F

AA55000D004A0828191107023FD99E0270
28191107023fd99e

【电表编程】
长按menu键
输入0011,按menu键确认
ID为modbus地址,修改后长按移位键确认修改;
PY为modbus校验方式,E为偶校验,N为无校验,O为奇校验;修改后长按移位键确认修改;
CT为变比设置



http://182.92.242.32:5001/api/manaul?command=64060014000101FB
 


采集脚本,周期60s
@DI1=2@DI2=2@DI3=2@DI4=2@IF=DI@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ELSE@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ENDIF
@DI1=2@DI2=2@DI3=2@DI4=2@IF=DI@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ELSE@H=CD11@C=0B0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ENDIF
@E=0@D=10S@B=9600@H=CD11@C=0B0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1
@D=10S@DI1=2@DI2=2@DI3=2@DI4=2@H=CD11@C=0B0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1
@D=10S@H=CD11@C=0B0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000034V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0038V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1
@H=DD01@DI1=?@H=DD02@DI2=?@H=DD03@DI3=?@H=DD04@DI4=?@D=3S@S=1@H=DA01@DO1=?@H=DA02@DO2=?@H=DA03@DO3=?@H=DA04@DO4=?@D=3S@S=1
事件触发电压电流采集
@DI1=2@DI2=2@DI3=2@DI4=2@IF=DI@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD11@C=0B0400000006V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD12@C=0B04001D0002V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD21@C=0C0400000006V@D=3S@S=1@H=CD22@C=0C04001D0002V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD31@C=0D0400000006V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD32@C=0D04001D0002V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD41@C=0E0400000006V1@D=3S@S=1@H=CD42@C=0E04001D0002V1@D=3S@S=1@H=DD01@C=640300100008V1@D=3S@S=1@ENDIF
